settings.title: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship all over the world. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout. We run discounts and promotions all year, so stay tuned for exclusive deals.

settings.title: How long will it take to get my order?
settings.answer: It depends on where you are. Orders processed here will take 5-7 business days to arrive. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.title: Exchanges/Returns
settings.answer:
We offer full refunds and exchanges for other variations of the product you'd like to return.

Our cutoff for the return process is 14 days following the day your package was delivered. The products must not be tampered with and the tag must still be on.

To start a return or exchange, please email us at Support@squidhaus.us with your order number and any other details that may help us facilitate your exchange/return.

settings.title: SquidHaus Transformation Promise
settings.answer:
SquidHaus is the only athletic apparel brand that actually wants to see you succeed. If you need to exchange an item due to a change in size resulting from a fitness achievement, we've got you covered.

1. Email support@squidhaus.us with your order number and progress pictures

2. Ship your old item to us and provide the tracking number

3. Once it arrives we will send you a brand new item in the size you need

Requirements

- Visible change in physique aligning with progress

- 3 months post purchase

- 1 product per customer

Post exchange - We'd love to showcase your amazing achievement on our page, so we'd greatly appreciate any gym or mirror pics in your new exchanged item.

settings.title: About your shop
settings.answer: Write content to help your customers to better understand your products or policies.
